title: Writing equations in LaTeX
text: What ways do you know to write an equation in latex? Which one would be the simplest one?

choices: This text is {x + 1} times cooler because it has math in it.
This text is $x + 1$ times cooler because it has math in it.
This text is #x + 1# times cooler because it has math in it.
This text is %x + 1% times cooler because it has math in it.
hintAnswer: This text is $x + 1$ times cooler because it has math in it.
title: Combining text and equations
text: With $ ... $ one can write an equation but how can such an equation be incorporated into text?

title: You need to include a fancy looking cursive R. How do you do that?
text: Greek letters are not a given on normal keyboard layouts. So LaTeX adds them as Keywords. What Keyword would you choose for a capital sigma?
